body_html:
Im still getting a similar error when I set num_workers > 0. Any help would be much appreciated.
I have built pytorch from source to use on my Mac with my eGPU (1080Ti).

Fatal Python error: Segmentation fault

Thread 0x000070000cc8d000 (most recent call first):
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/multiprocessing/queue.py", line 21 in recv
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 376 in get
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 68 in _worker_manager_loop
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 754 in run
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 801 in __bootstrap_inner
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 774 in __bootstrap

Thread 0x000070000c381000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x000070000c27b000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x000070000c784000 (most recent call first):
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 340 in wait
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/Queue.py", line 168 in get
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorboardX/event_file_writer.py", line 186 in run
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 801 in __bootstrap_inner
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 774 in __bootstrap

Thread 0x00007fffd9efe3c0 (most recent call first):
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/process.py", line 78 in _cleanup
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/process.py", line 125 in start
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 234 in __init__
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 417 in __iter__
  File "train.py", line 289 in train

body:
Im still getting a similar error when I set num_workers > 0. Any help would be much appreciated.
I have built pytorch from source to use on my Mac with my eGPU (1080Ti).
```
Fatal Python error: Segmentation fault

Thread 0x000070000cc8d000 (most recent call first):
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/multiprocessing/queue.py", line 21 in recv
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 376 in get
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 68 in _worker_manager_loop
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 754 in run
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 801 in __bootstrap_inner
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 774 in __bootstrap

Thread 0x000070000c381000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x000070000c27b000 (most recent call first):

Thread 0x000070000c784000 (most recent call first):
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 340 in wait
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/Queue.py", line 168 in get
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorboardX/event_file_writer.py", line 186 in run
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 801 in __bootstrap_inner
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 774 in __bootstrap

Thread 0x00007fffd9efe3c0 (most recent call first):
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/process.py", line 78 in _cleanup
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/multiprocessing/process.py", line 125 in start
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 234 in __init__
  File "/Users/ajaychainani/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 417 in __iter__

  File "train.py", line 86 in main
```
